title: Create Core UI Components
description: Develop core UI components including buttons, inputs, cards, and modals that follow the design system

user_stories: As a developer, I need reusable core components so that I can build UIs faster
As a designer, I want components that follow design guidelines so that the UI is cohesive
business_rules: Core components must follow the established design system
Components must be accessible and WCAG compliant
Components must be responsive and mobile-friendly
Components must be well-documented with usage examples
edge_cases: Handling different states (hover, focus, disabled) for components
Ensuring accessibility compliance for all components
Managing responsive behavior across different screen sizes
Implementing proper error handling and validation

acceptance_criteria: Core UI components are created and documented
Components are properly tested for functionality and appearance

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow Angular best practices for component development. Ensure all components are accessible and responsive. Use design tokens for consistent styling.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure components properly sanitize inputs and prevent injection attacks
